ygData.subject: IGL, A cackle in the arena.
ygData.msgSnippet: Silently, Nightmare flew on through the whisps of clouds. They had been traveling for days now, searching for this, Arena . He lived for the fight, and

Subject: IGL, A cackle in the arena.
References: <91.f4803c9.28b6f761@...>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Silently, Nightmare flew on through the whisps of clouds. They had been
traveling for days now, searching for this, "Arena". He lived for the
fight, and couldnt wait to showcase his talents. His brother felt the
same way, but was not hidding it as well. Bits of oil kept dripping onto
his mane, and he was getting annoid. 

"Get a hold of yourself brother." he moaned in his emotionless voice.

"He he ha, I can't help it, I can practically taste the fuel." he
rasped, liking his lips, and tightening his grip on his brothers main,
his talons making a hissing metal against metal scratching noise. He
then clenched his fists, leaned over, and pointed with enthusiasm. 

"THERE." He screamed, pointing at the Obylisk. The huge ship dwarfed the
two robots, as they rode towards it, the area totally silent, except for
the rythmic flapping of Nightmares huge, skeletal like wings. They both
folded up, as he tilted downards, and began to pick up speed on his
descent, then, when close enough to the ground, he evened out, and his
legs began to beat against the rough earth, as his wings began to flap
again to steady himself, then stopped, as he dashed forward, iron hooves
of steel continued to rip at the ground as he headed towards the Arena
like ship.

Jagged tumbled from the metalic sattle, and transformed into his Hyena
form before hitting the ground, his claws digging into the dry soil, and
gaining traction, as his powerful legs then propelled him forward,
beside his brother at a slow pace. The Obylisk grew as they approached
it.
